thread.title: Fodor's Week in Travel: American Adventures
thread.title_full: Fodor's Week in Travel: American Adventures

title: Fodor's Week in Travel: American Adventures
text:
Fodor's Week in Travel: American Adventures Fodor's Week in Travel: American Adventures Posted by Sara Quaranta on August 7, 2015 at 3:00:00 PM EDT | Post a Comment 
You don't have to travel far to revel in big cities or take in gorgeous views. From two days of rock 'n' roll and barbecue to train rides through breathtaking fall foliage, your next domestic trips await you here. 10 Best Fall Foliage Trips in the U.S. 
From coast to coast, American trees will be displaying a cheap and easy way to take in the nation's natural beauty. Check out one of these jaw-dropping destinations . 48 Hours in Memphis 
Make your two days in the Home of the Blues count by touring iconic music studios, historic museums, and, of course, The King's home at Graceland. 10 Best U.S. Train Trips to Take This Fall 
Opt to travel by train this autumn for awe-inspiring views of color-changing trees on a scenic trip. Ultimate Guide to Brooklyn's Neighborhoods 
Here's the rundown on the unique charms and appeals of eighteen areas in New York City's most hipster borough . 
Top to Bottom: Bill Perry/Shutterstock; Alexis Korman; Rocky Grimes; Mary Robnett
